Subskills.name: Slice and Dice
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bounces for chainslice.

Subskills.name: Slicing Accuracy
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using chainslice.

Subskills.name: Bloodburn
Subskills.description: Unleash small blood novas on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Vagabond Quickblades
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of chainslice.

Subskills.name: Poisoned Shiv
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict poisoned.

Subskills.name: Chainception
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to release an additional chainslice.

Subskills.name: Agile Footwork
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using chainslice.

Subskills.name: Infected Wounds
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Ghost Blade
Subskills.description: Each chainslice hit scatters a flying blade spawning a phantom blade when landing.

Subskills.name: Critical Shred
Subskills.description: When chainslice critically strikes it sends out additional scimitars in all directions.
